Title: Relates to the award of competitive civil service status for the spouse or children of military service persons killed in the line of duty
Summary: Relates to the award of competitive civil service status for the spouse or children of military service persons killed in the line of duty.
LawCode: Add ยง85-d, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the award of competitive civil service status for the spouse or children of military service persons killed in the line of duty
